name: Finger Vs Mouth 2020
description:
If you want to protect your finger from hungry monsters who are trying to eat your fingers then try this game. There are awesome game controls an you will be at the edge of your seats when you play this awesome hypercasual game. Hypercasual games are the best games to play as they donot have any violence or extra activities. This is a very clear game and at the end of playing each level you will be more than happy and your mind will be calm and relaxed. Finger Vs Mouth is an addictive and super casual game which will blow your mind.

* Amazing animation and sound effects
* Realistic visual effects
* Very addictive time killer
* and tons of fun

In this game you need to save yourself from monsters attack which will like try to eat your finger. This game is an Endless Game.

Download Mouth Vs Finger now and save your finger from being eaten up and have fun all the way.

I hope everybody finds this game addictive. If you like this game give 5 stars and help spread the game among your friends and families.
